means: 人聪明的( wise的比较级 )

sentence.Network_en: It would be wiser to cut out all alcohol during pregnancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 在怀孕期间最好滴酒不沾。

sentence.Network_en: Perhaps he has grown wiser with age.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能随着年纪增长，他变聪明了。

sentence.Network_en: After all his explanations , I remained none the wiser.
sentence.Network_cn: 他讲了半天, 我还是糊里糊涂.

PerfectNetExp.abs: EXenglish 数位英语学院第 51课 ... ( 肥胖的 ) fatter ( 有智慧的 ) wiser ( 温柔的 ) gentler.
Today South Africa is a lot happier , wiser and more prosperous ., 但今天的南非已经比过去要幸福 , 明智 , 繁荣得多.
the wise seeks advice from the wiser ., 聪明人寻求更聪明人的指教.

your Week Ahead Part Two : sometimes , when you are trying to solve a crossword puzzle , you can stare at the same clue for ages and feel none the wiser .对于你，这一周还有一个部分。有时，当你试图去解决一个横亘的问题时，常常成年累月地盯着同样的线索，因此感到没有更明智的做法了。

list.abs: for he was wiser than all men ; than Ethan the Ezrahite , and Heman , and Chalcol , and Darda , the sons of Mahol : and his fame was in all nations round about .31他的智慧胜过万人，胜过以斯拉人以探，并玛曷的儿子希幔，甲各，达大的智慧。他的名声传扬在四围的列国。
爽尔_母婴用品_5198商城帮您省钱... ... Phyll 奥绒 wiser mami 迪宝乐 BABiBOO 纽源莎顿.

my friend and managing agent , Jorge Mendes There are moments in life when we all impulse when it would be wiser to stop , take a breath and think in a more sensible and rational way .人生中总有一些冲动的事迹，我们必须聪明地制止这一切发生，深呼吸，想清楚并选择一个理智的方式解决。
you will grow wiser as you grow older ., 你会随着年龄的增长而越来越聪明.

entry.tran: （人）充满智慧的，英明的，睿智的
entry.def: A wise person is able to use their experience and knowledge in order to make sensible decisions and judgments.

example.ex: She has the air of a wise woman...
You're a wise old man: tell me what to do.
example.tran: 您是位睿智的长者：告诉我该怎么办。

entry.def: A wise action or decision is sensible.

example.ex: It's never wise to withhold evidence...
example.tran: 藏匿证据绝非明智之举。

example.ex: She had made a very wise decision...
example.tran: 她作了一个非常明智的决定。

entry.def: If someone says to you that it would be wise to do something, they are advising you to do it, because it is the most sensible and reasonable action or decision in a particular situation.

example.ex: It would be wise to get his eyes checked to ensure there is no problem.
example.tran: 最好检查一下他的眼睛，确保没有问题。

entry.tran: 明白，察觉(尤指他人试图保密之事)
entry.def: If you get wise to something, you find out about it, especially when someone has been trying to keep it secret.

example.ex: Dealers have already got wise to the trend and increased their prices accordingly.
example.tran: 交易商已经摸清了动向，相应提高了价格。

entry.tran: （在事后或作出解释后）仍然不明白，仍旧不完全知晓
entry.def: If you say that someone is none the wiser after an event or an explanation, or that nobody is any the wiser after it, you mean that they have failed to understand it, or are not fully aware of what happened.

example.ex: The brewers are still none the wiser about the shape the Government envisages for the industry...
example.tran: 啤酒公司对政府对该行业的构想仍然不甚明了。

example.ex: We could have stolen the original from the warehouse without you being any the wiser.
example.tran: 我们本可以把原作从库房里偷出来而完全不让你知晓。

auth_sentence.content: Big has not proven to be better or wiser.
auth_sentence.res_content: Big has not proven to be better or wiser.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Big has not proven to be better or wiser.

auth_sentence.content: But of course the master craftsman was wiser.
auth_sentence.res_content: But of course the master craftsman was wiser.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But of course the master craftsman was wiser.

auth_sentence.content: How sad that "kinda" sounds to wiser ears.
auth_sentence.res_content: How sad that "kinda" sounds to wiser ears.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How sad that "kinda" sounds to wiser ears.

Sentence.sentence: The urgency of slowing down-to find the time and space to think-is nothing new, of course, and wiser souls have always reminded us that the more attention we pay to the moment, the less time and energy we have to place it in some larger context.
